{"id":1275534267,"question_id":72,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1717348883,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"253 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1275534267/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"24.6 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def minDistance(self, word1: str, word2: str) -> int:\n        cache = {}\n        w1 = list(word1)\n        w2 = list(word2)\n\n        # return 0\n        def dfs(i, j, w1):\n            if i==j==len(w1)==len(w2):\n                return 0\n            if i>=len(w1) or j>= len(w2):\n                return abs(len(w2) - len(w1))\n            string = ''.join(w1)\n            if string in cache:\n                return cache[string]\n            \n            if w1[i] == w2[j]:\n                take = dfs(i+1, j+1, w1)\n            else:\n                # insert\n                n1 = w1[::]\n                n1.insert(i, w2[j])\n                take = 1 + dfs(i+1, j+1, n1)\n\n                # delete\n                n1 = w1[::]\n                n1.pop(i)\n                take = min(take, 1+dfs(i, j, n1))\n                \n                # replace\n                n1 = w1[::]\n                n1[i] = w2[j]\n                take = min(take, 1+dfs(i+1, j+1, n1))\n            \n            cache[string] = take\n            return take            \n\n\n        return dfs(0,0, w1)\n    ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
